live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
57615.summary: Some customers in Kamloops are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57615.title: Feb 5 - Kamloops | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 20:50 PT.
57625.summary: Some customers in the Barlow Creek area of Quesnel are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57625.title: Feb 5 - Quesnel (Barlow Creek) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
